    How to use shapper

    Alicja Gosiewska

    2018-11-18

    how_to_use_shapper.Rmd

    Model preparation

    library("shapper")
library("DALEX")
library("randomForest")
Y_train <- HR$status
x_train <- HR[ , -6]
x_train$gender <- as.numeric(x_train$gender)

set.seed(123)
model_rf <- randomForest(x = x_train, y = Y_train)

    Caculating individual variable attributions

    p_fun <- function(x, data){
  predict(x, newdata = data, type = "prob")
}

ive <- individual_variable_effect(x = model_rf, data = x_train, 
                                  predict_function = p_fun,
                           new_observation = x_train[1,])
ive
    ##     gender      age    hours evaluation salary _id_ _ylevel_ _yhat_
## 1        2 32.58267 41.88626          3      1    1    fired  0.826
## 1.3      2 32.58267 41.88626          3      1    1    fired  0.826

## 1.6      2 32.58267 41.88626          3      1    1    fired  0.826
## 1.1      2 32.58267 41.88626          3      1    1       ok  0.168

    Plotting results

    plot(ive)
